issue.title: [Java] Fix the bugs when calculating vector hash code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7020](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7020). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When calculating the hash code for a value in the vector, the validity bit must be taken into account.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7020?focusedCommentId=16969789) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5752
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5752>
